title: Did the ticket manager ask the event to present evidence of the CAVID-19 negative test?
subtitle: This possibility was one of a series of new features designed to facilitate the organization of live events in the COVID-19 world.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In November 2020, the ticket manager announced that he intended to ask the event participants to verify that they had tested negatively for the new krona virus within a 72-hour time frame.
